about_the_game:
Survive...Together!

Hellcome is a challenging and exciting survival party game in which, players must battle their way through hordes of zombies and other hellish creatures in order to survive.

You'll control various characters, each with their own unique abilities. And more playable characters and enemies are coming soon!

Multiplayer COOP Mode:

You can team up with friends to take on the challenges of the game together. Work together to complete objectives, defeat bosses, and survive as long as possible. But if you're feeling brave, you can also play the game solo - but be warned, the challenges are even more intense when you're on your own.

Toony 3D Graphics:

The game's environments are detailed and colorful, and the character designs are whimsical and fun.

Intense and Challenging Gameplay:

Despite the lighthearted visuals, there's no auto-aim to make things easier! You'll need to rely on your own skills and reflexes to take down the zombie hordes.

Unlock New Abilities and Builds:

Experiment with different combinations to find the ones that work best for you. With a big bunch of abilities to choose from, there's always something new to discover.


Hellcome is a thrilling and challenging game that's perfect for players who love roguelite games, bullet hell shooters, and cooperative multiplayer experiences.

name: Hellcome Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 2200, Core i3 6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050, RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600, Core i7 6700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6gb, RX 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: SURVIVE TOGETHER! Hellcome is a Multiplayer Roguelite Shooter designed for 1-4 players who want challenging experiences. Play with various characters, play single or team up with your friends and unlock new abilities to stay alive. So get ready to Rummmble!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
